org.richfaces.fragment.contextMenu

Interface PopupMenu

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PopupMenuGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPopupMenu, RichFacesContextMenu, RichFacesDropDownMenu

    public interface PopupMenu
extends PopupMenuGroup
    Author:
    Jiri Stefek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(ChoicePicker picker, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
      Expands group from this menu, which satisfies the rules given in picker param.
      PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(int index, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
      Expands group from this menu, which index equals the given index param.
      PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(String header, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
      Expands group from this menu, which text representation matches the given header param.
      void selectItem(ChoicePicker picker, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
      Selects the menu item from this menu or sub menu according to the rules defined in the picker param.
      void selectItem(int index, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
      Selects the menu item from this menu according to its index in the list of all menu items.
      void selectItem(String header, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
      Selects the menu item from this menu according to the exact match of its text representation with passed header param.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.richfaces.fragment.contextMenu.PopupMenuGroup

        expandGroup, expandGroup, expandGroup, selectItem, selectItem, selectItem

    • Method Detail

      • selectItem

        void selectItem(ChoicePicker picker,
              org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Selects the menu item from this menu or sub menu according to the rules defined in the picker param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Parameters:
        picker - for defining the rules by which the item will be selected
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element which satisfies the rules given by picker

      • selectItem

        void selectItem(String header,
              org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Selects the menu item from this menu according to the exact match of its text representation with passed header param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Parameters:
        header - text representation of the menu item to be selected
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element with text representation matching the given header

      • selectItem

        void selectItem(int index,
              org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Selects the menu item from this menu according to its index in the list of all menu items. Opens menu, if it is not visible. Items are indexed from 0. A top menu item (the one which is the closest to the root of the popup menu component) has index 0.
        Parameters:
        index - zero based index of the item to be selected
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element with index index

      • expandGroup

        PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(ChoicePicker picker,
                         org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Expands group from this menu, which satisfies the rules given in picker param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Parameters:
        picker - object to define which group should be expanded
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Returns:
        the group which was expanded
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element which satisfies the rules given by picker

      • expandGroup

        PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(String header,
                         org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Expands group from this menu, which text representation matches the given header param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Parameters:
        header - the header of the group which should be expanded
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Returns:
        the group which was expanded
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element with text representation matching the given header

      • expandGroup

        PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(int index,
                         org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Expands group from this menu, which index equals the given index param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Parameters:
        index - zero based index of the group to expand
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Returns:
        the group which was expanded
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no such element with index index
